pr_title: Fix issue with including libraries in resources directory

timeline.message: Fix error with java libs in resources directory
Add testcase for test libs in resources directory

timeline.bodyText: Where have we committed these JARs in the PR ?
timeline.author: hemikak

replies.bodyText: Seems missed due to git ignore. Added with latest commit
replies.author: warunalakshitha

timeline.bodyText: Where have we committed these JARs in the PR ?
timeline.author: hemikak
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+[project]
+org-name = "toml"
+version = "0.7.2"
+
+[platform]
+target = "java8"
+
+  [[platform.libraries]]
+  artifactId = "toml4j"
+  version = "0.7.2"
+  path = "./src/toml4j/resources/libs/toml4j-0.7.2.jar"
+  groupId = "com.moandjiezana.toml"
+  module = "toml4j"
+
+  [[platform.libraries]]
+  artifactId = "gson"
+  version = "2.8.1"
+  path = "./src/toml4j/resources/libs/gson-2.8.1.jar"

timeline.author: hemikak
